Petugas Bandara Kaget, Kirain Penumpang Bawa Pistol Tahunya...
03 Nov 2019, 21:46 by Bonauli


Tissu holder Revolver (TSA)

Jakarta - Ada-ada saja memang cerita dari penumpang pesawat dunia. Kali ini ada penumpang yang bikin kaget petugas bandara. Ia kedapatan membawa pistol yang tak biasa.Seorang calon penumpang di Newark Liberty International Airport, New Jersey harus digeledah oleh petugas Transportation Security Administration (TSA). Dilansir detikcom dari Fox News, Minggu (3/11/2019) penumpang tersebut membawa barang mencurigakan.Penumpang yang tak disebutkan namanya tersebut digeledah saat melewati pintu check in. Dari tas bawaannya terdapat pistol revolver.Eits, ternyata ini bukan revolver sungguhan. Barang yang dibawa adalah tissu holder yang berbentuk pistol alias revolver replika.


Foto: (TSA)

Tissu holder ialah gantungan khusus tissu toilet. Tak ada alasan yang jelas mengapa penumpang tersebut membawa tissu holder berbentuk pistol ke bandara.Yang jelas, penumpang ini memiliki 3 pilihan dari Transportation Security Administrationihan untuk pistol replika tersebut. Revolver tersebut boleh dibawa dalam bagasi, penumpang tersebut meminta seseorang untuk mengambilnya di bandara atau menyerahkannya kepada petugas TSA. Dari keterangan TSA, penumpang tersebut memilih untuk menyerahkannya kepada TSA. Petugas TSA pun mengamankannya dengan senang hati.Seperti yang traveler ketahui, membawa benda apa pun yang menyerupai senjata tidak diperbolehkan dalam penerbangan. Jadi cek kembali barang bawaanmu sebelum liburan ya detikers!Simak Video "Ditabrak Pesawat, Sebuah Rumah di New Jersey Terbakar "[Gambas:Video 20detik](bnl/aff)

Shocked Airport Officers, Kirain Passenger Carrying His Handgun ...
03 Nov 2019, 21:46 by Bonauli


Revolver tissue holder (TSA)

Jakarta - What nonsense is it indeed the story of world plane passengers. This time there were passengers who surprised the airport officials. He was found carrying an unusual pistol. A prospective passenger at Newark Liberty International Airport, New Jersey had to be searched by Transportation Security Administration (TSA) officers. Reported by AFP from Fox News, Sunday (3/11/2019) the passenger was carrying suspicious goods. The passenger who was not named was searched when passing through the check-in door. From the bag there is a revolver.Eits pistol, apparently this is not a real revolver. The items carried are pistol-shaped tissue holders, aka replica revolvers.


Photo: (TSA)

A tissue holder is a special toilet tissue hanger. There is no clear reason why the passenger is carrying a gun-shaped tissue holder to the airport. Clearly, this passenger has 3 choices of Transportation Security Administration for the replica pistol. The revolver may be carried in the trunk, the passenger asks someone to pick it up at the airport or hand it over to the TSA officer. From the TSA's information, the passenger chose to submit it to TSA. TSA officers also secure it. As the traveler knows, carrying anything that looks like a weapon is not allowed on a flight. So check your belongings before the holiday, okay? Check out the video "Hit by an Airplane, A House in New Jersey Burned" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (bnl / aff)
